Blood Inferno's guild web page -- Founded in July 1999, we are the largest "family" guild on the Brell Serilis server of Everquest. If you are new here, please take the time to visit our site and add your personal thoughts on our comments page.

News: Submit News

Hello everyone, we have some news to relay to the guild.

First of all, we have a new webmaster, Ueuar, to keep the page up to date and he will talk in third person ablout himself like he is now. He will be updating the webpage the best he can, but he will be delayed for a while because he can not find his Microsoft Fontpage editor so he has to type out all the HTML which takes forever. He will also start to get the webpage back in order with the help of Zythen and Nadia.

New changes:
  • June 27, 2001:

I refitted the home page so that it loads faster. I am also switched the picture of the month very soon with a picture that Kileras gave me of the guild waving. By the way, the web page took so long to load because of the java scripted integrated with the HTML. Also Jondin suggested that I resize the links to the left because they were too small for people with a different screen.

  • May 31, 2001:

As soon as Zythen and Nadia start e-mailing Ueuar with information he will begin to put it up. People that need important information put on to the guild webpage such as raid information, new recruit information, and alt info, etc. etc. please e-mail Ueuar at Darkcaster75@aol.com. Next up is that Ueuar will get the links on the right up to date. If anyone wants pictures from there to be saved, please e-mail which ones because the geocities account is starting to run out of space. Ueuar will post more information/updates on the main page as they come along. (This is Ueuar, i like to talk in third person when doing webpages becauseit seems more... professional.)
